title: Nanoscale magnetic imaging of a single electron spin under ambient conditions
title_cn: 在环境条件下单个电子自旋的纳米级磁性成像

title: Anisotropic impurity states, quasiparticle scattering and nematic transport in underdoped Ca(Fe1−xCox)2As2
title_cn: Ca（Fe1-xCox）2As2掺杂中的各向异性杂质态，准粒子散射和向列输运

title: Electrically tunable transverse magnetic focusing in graphene
title_cn: 石墨烯中的电可调横向磁聚焦

title: Quantum dynamics of a mobile spin impurity
title_cn: 移动自旋杂质的量子动力学
abstract: One of the elementary processes in quantum magnetism is the propagation of spin excitations. Here we study the quantum dynamics of a deterministically created spin-impurity atom, as it propagates in a one-dimensional lattice system. We probe the spatial probability distribution of the impurity at different times using single-site-resolved imaging of bosonic atoms in an optical lattice. In the Mott-insulating regime, the quantum-coherent propagation of a magnetic excitation in the Heisenberg model can be observed using a post-selection technique. Extending the study to the superfluid regime of the bath, we quantitatively determine how the bath affects the motion of the impurity, showing evidence of polaronic behaviour. The experimental data agree with theoretical predictions, allowing us to determine the effect of temperature on the impurity motion. Our results provide a new approach to studying quantum magnetism, mobile impurities in quantum fluids and polarons in lattice systems.
abstract_cn: 量子磁性的基本过程之一是自旋激发的传播。在这里，我们研究确定性地创建的自旋杂质原子在一维晶格系统中传播时的量子动力学。我们使用光晶格中的玻色子原子的单点分辨成像来探究杂质在不同时间的空间概率分布。在莫特绝缘状态下，可以使用后选择技术观察海森堡模型中磁激发的量子相干传播。将研究扩展到熔池的超流体状态，我们可以定量确定熔池如何影响杂质的运动，从而显示出极化现象。实验数据与理论预测相符，从而使我们能够确定温度对杂质运动的影响。我们的结果为研究量子磁性，量子流体中的可移动杂质以及晶格系统中的极化子提供了一种新方法。

title: Spin-dependent trapping of electrons at spinterfaces
title_cn: 电子在界面上的自旋依赖性俘获
abstract: Hybrid ferromagnetic metal/organic interfaces—also known as spinterfaces—can exhibit highly efficient spin-filtering properties and therefore present a promising class of materials for the future development of new spintronic devices. Advancing the field depends critically on elucidating the fundamental microscopic processes that eventually determine the spin-filtering properties in such hybrid structures. Here, we study the femtosecond spin dynamics at the prototypical interface between cobalt and the metalorganic complex tris(8-hydroxyquinolinato)aluminium. To disentangle the microscopic origin of spin filtering, we optically generate a transient spin polarization in a well-defined hybrid interface state that we follow with a spin-resolved real-time pump–probe two-photon photoemission experiment. We find that the electrons are trapped at the interface in a spin-dependent manner for a surprisingly long time of the order of 0.5–1 ps. We conclude that ferromagnetic metal/organic interfaces act as spin filters because electrons are trapped in hybrid interface states by spin-dependent confining potentials.
abstract_cn: 混合铁磁金属/有机界面（也称为spinterfaces）可以表现出高效的自旋过滤特性，因此为新型自旋电子器件的未来发展提供了一种有希望的材料。推进该领域至关重要地取决于阐明最终确定这种混合结构中的自旋过滤特性的基本微观过程。在这里，我们研究了钴与金属有机配合物三（8-羟基喹啉基）铝之间原型界面处的飞秒自旋动力学。为了弄清自旋滤波的微观起源，我们以明确定义的混合界面状态光学生成瞬态自旋极化，然后进行自旋分辨实时泵浦探针两光子光发射实验。我们发现，电子以自旋相关的方式被捕获在界面上，持续了令人惊讶的长时间，约为0.5 ps 1到820 ps。我们得出的结论是，铁磁金属/有机界面起自旋过滤器的作用，因为电子被自旋相关的约束电势俘获为混合界面态。

title: Photoexcitation cascade and multiple hot-carrier generation in graphene
title_cn: 石墨烯中的光激发级联反应和多种热载流子的产生
abstract: The conversion of light into free electron–hole pairs constitutes the key process in the fields of photodetection and photovoltaics. The efficiency of this process depends on the competition of different relaxation pathways and can be greatly enhanced when photoexcited carriers do not lose energy as heat, but instead transfer their excess energy into the production of additional electron–hole pairs through carrier–carrier scattering processes. Here we use optical pump–terahertz probe measurements to probe different pathways contributing to the ultrafast energy relaxation of photoexcited carriers. Our results indicate that carrier–carrier scattering is highly efficient, prevailing over optical-phonon emission in a wide range of photon wavelengths and leading to the production of secondary hot electrons originating from the conduction band. As hot electrons in graphene can drive currents, multiple hot-carrier generation makes graphene a promising material for highly efficient broadband extraction of light energy into electronic degrees of freedom, enabling high-efficiency optoelectronic applications.
abstract_cn: 光到自由电子的转换是空穴在光电检测和光伏领域的关键过程。该过程的效率取决于不同弛豫途径的竞争，并且当光激发载流子不会以热量形式失去能量，而是通过载流子将其多余的能量转移到产生额外的电子空穴对时，可以大大提高效率。载流子散射过程。在这里，我们使用光泵太赫兹探针测量来探测有助于光激发载流子超快能量弛豫的不同途径。我们的结果表明，载流子散射是高效的，在宽的光子波长范围内优于光子发射，并导致产生源自导带的二次热电子。由于石墨烯中的热电子可以驱动电流，因此多种热载流子的产生使石墨烯成为将光能高效宽带提取为电子自由度的有前途的材料，从而实现了高效的光电应用。

title: Creation and dynamics of knotted vortices
title_cn: 打结涡旋的产生和动力学
abstract: Knots and links have been conjectured to play a fundamental role in a wide range of physical fields, including plasmas and fluids, both quantum and classical. In fluids, the fundamental knottedness-carrying excitations occur in the form of linked and knotted vortex loops, which have been conjectured to exist for over a century. Although they have been the subject of considerable theoretical study, their creation in the laboratory has remained an outstanding experimental goal. Here we report the creation of isolated trefoil vortex knots and pairs of linked vortex rings in water using a new method of accelerating specially shaped hydrofoils. Using a high-speed scanning tomography apparatus, we measure their three-dimensional topological and geometrical evolution in detail. In both cases we observe that the linked vortices stretch themselves and then deform—as dictated by their geometrically determined energy—towards a series of local vortex reconnections. This work establishes the existence and dynamics of knotted vortices in real fluids.
abstract_cn: 人们已经推测，结和链节将在包括量子和经典的等离子体和流体在内的广泛物理领域中发挥基本作用。在流体中，基本的带结节的激发形式是链接的和打结的旋涡环，这种现象被认为已经存在了一个多世纪。尽管它们已成为大量理论研究的主题，但它们在实验室中的创造仍然是一个出色的实验目标。在这里，我们报告了使用特殊形状的水翼加速的新方法在水中创建孤立的三叶形涡旋结和成对的涡旋环。使用高速扫描层析成像设备，我们详细测量了其三维拓扑和几何演变。在这两种情况下，我们都观察到，相连的涡旋会自行拉伸，然后根据其几何确定的能量而变形，朝一系列局部涡旋重新连接。这项工作建立了真实流体中打结涡旋的存在和动力学。</ p>
